section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The purpose clause is initially defined as IT development, internet back office maintenance, and deployment of medical services. However, the subsequent sentence grants BorrowMoney.com, inc. unilateral discretion to change this purpose at any time. This creates a potential contradiction because JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go entered the agreement with a specific understanding of the Venture's purpose, which can be altered without their consent. This could lead to disputes if the purpose is changed to something that is not within the original scope or intent of the joint venture.

section: Each Member will be responsible for its respective duties as follows:  Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The description of BorrowMoney.com, Inc.'s duties has an asterisk before the description and it is un-grammatical as well as does not make sense. The asterisk is likely a typo and unnecessary. The description of BorrowMoney.com, Inc. duties does not flow logically and also seems incomplete.

section: Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
explanation: This provision presents a contradiction. It states that the duties of members can be amended by a decision of the members. However, it also states that if the Members' interests are affected, it requires unanimous consent of the Members. These statements contradict themselves. The duties themselves directly affect the members' interests therefore all duty changes should require unanimous consent of the members.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The term 'Agreed Value' is used to define the contribution of each party. However, the contribution description for both parties is vague and potentially misaligned. For BorrowMoney.com, Inc., providing office space with a 'specified description of duty' is not clearly defined and may lead to disputes over what the actual value is. The same goes for JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go. The description of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's capital contribution is confusing. It states '$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Addition to The Total Contributions'. The 10% should be taken out of the equation.

section: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: This clause creates an imbalance in voting power that may be considered unfair or inequitable, especially if JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go is not aware of this discrepancy or if it was not properly negotiated. Each member should be considered equal and should have one vote.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This clause gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. unilateral power to amend the agreement, regardless of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's objections. This contradicts the principle of mutual agreement and good faith expected in a joint venture. JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go may feel that the new changes do not benefit them and that they have no say in the changes.
